title: Shinkyoku Soukai Polyphonica - Cardinal Crimson
alternative_title: 神曲奏界ポリフォニカ ; 神曲奏界ポリフォニカ カーディナル・クリムゾン ; 神曲奏界Polyphonica~绯紅~ ; Polyphonic Cardinal Crimson ; Shinkyoku Sōkai Polyphonica ; Shinkyoku Soukai Polyphonica
status: 神曲奏界ポリフォニカ ; 神曲奏界ポリフォニカ カーディナル・クリムゾン ; 神曲奏界Polyphonica~绯紅~ ; Polyphonic Cardinal Crimson ; Shinkyoku Sōkai Polyphonica ; Shinkyoku Soukai Polyphonica
description:
Description :
        In a place called Polyphonica, humans and spirits live side by side. Young musicians create magical sounds with their music, which bind the spirits to them. A struggling student named Phoron accidentally summons a spirit he met in childhood but later forgot about. Phoron could use all the help he can get, but this feisty spirit may prove to be more than he can handle!
